kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot in JPEG format and embeds it into the log file.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until element passed is located on Page and click element
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot in JPEG format and embeds it into the log file.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
kw.arg: Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
kw.doc: Runs the keyword and continues execution even if a failure occurs.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
kw.doc: Runs the keyword and continues execution even if a failure occurs.

kw.name: Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns a list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
